column3: This covers forest of all types, including primary and planted forests. It is measured in hectares.
column10: Riahi et al. (2017). The Shared Socioeconomic Pathways and their energy, land use, and greenhouse gas emissions implications: An overview, Global Environmental Change

column3: Cropland area includes land used for crop production for human food, animal feed, and industrial uses. It is measured in hectares.
column10: Riahi et al. (2017). The Shared Socioeconomic Pathways and their energy, land use, and greenhouse gas emissions implications: An overview, Global Environmental Change

column3: Pasture land is land used for livestock grazing. It is measured in hectares.
column10: Riahi et al. (2017). The Shared Socioeconomic Pathways and their energy, land use, and greenhouse gas emissions implications: An overview, Global Environmental Change

column3: Built-up area includes land used for cities, towns, villages and human infrastructure such as roads, transport networks and mining.
column10: Riahi et al. (2017). The Shared Socioeconomic Pathways and their energy, land use, and greenhouse gas emissions implications: An overview, Global Environmental Change

column3: Total crop demand is measured in tonnes of dry matter. This adjusts for differences in the physical composition and water content of different crops.
column10: Riahi et al. (2017). The Shared Socioeconomic Pathways and their energy, land use, and greenhouse gas emissions implications: An overview, Global Environmental Change

column3: Energy crops include all crops used for biofuels or solid energy sources. It is measured in tonnes of dry matter. This adjusts for differences in the physical composition and water content of different crops.
